desc:
Click Combo: RIGHT-LEFT-RIGHT
Violently bash the ground, dealing high damage in a large area.
Mana Cost: 40
Total Damage: 200% (of your DPS)
 (Damage: 170%)
 (Earth: 30%)
Area of Effect: 4 Blocks (Circle-Shaped)
Range: 3 Blocks
Improve your Main Attack's damage and range w/ spear
Reduce the Mana cost of Bash. </br> Mana Cost: -10

Bash will hit a second time at a farther range.

Total Damage: -30% (of your DPS, per bash)
 (Damage: -30%)
Range: +3 Blocks
Click Combo: RIGHT-RIGHT-RIGHT </br> Charge forward at a high speed. (Hold shift while charging to cancel) </br> Mana Cost: 25

After using Charge, violently crash down unto the ground and deal damage.

Total Damage: 120% (of your DPS)
 (Damage: 120%)
Area of Effect: 4 Blocks
For every 1% or 1 Raw Main Attack Damage you have from items, gain +2% Walk Speed (Max 20%) </br> Damage Bonus: +5 (Raw)
Harden your skin and gain +5% Base Resistance. </br> For every 1% or 1 Raw Health Regen you have from items, gain +10 Health (Max 100)

Click Combo: RIGHT-LEFT-LEFT
Hurls enemies upwards and deal massive damage.
Mana Cost: 40
Total Damage: 340% (of your DPS)
 (Damage: 260%)
 (Earth: 40%)
 (Thunder: 40%)
Area of Effect: 1-4 Blocks (Cone-Shaped)
Range: 6.5 Blocks
Reduce the Mana cost of Charge. </br> Mana Cost: -5

Click Combo: RIGHT-RIGHT-LEFT
Emits a roar that deals damage, pulls nearby enemies and gives you and nearby players resistance.
Mana Cost: 30
Total Damage: 100% (of your DPS)
 (Damage: 75%)
 (Fire: 25%)
Effect: 20% Resistance Bonus to Allies
Area of Effect: 12 Blocks (Circle-Shaped)
Duration: 30s
Increase your base damage from all Earth attacks. </br> </br>Earth Damage: +2-4 </br>Earth Damage: +20%
Increase your base damage from all Thunder attacks. </br> </br>Thunder Damage: +1-8 </br>Thunder Damage: +10%
Increase your damage from all Water attacks. </br> </br>Water Damage: +2-4 </br>Water Damage: +15%
Increase your base damage from all Air attacks. </br> </br>Air Damage: +3-4 </br>Air Damage: +15%
Increase your base damage from all Fire attacks. </br> </br>Fire Damage: +3-5 </br>Fire Damage: +15%

Bash will cast 4 times consecutively at double the speed.

Total Damage: -20% (of your DPS, per bash)
 (Damage: -20%)
Range: +6 Blocks

Mobs hit by Uppercut will explode mid-air and receive additional damage.

Total Damage: +100% (of your DPS)
 (Damage: +80%)
 (Thunder: +20%)

Uppercut will deal a footsweep attack at a longer and wider angle.
Mana Cost: -5
Total Damage: -30% (of your DPS)
 (Damage: -60%)
 (Water: +30%)
Range: +1.5 Blocks

Damages enemies in your way when using Charge.

Total Damage: 120%
 (Damage: 100%)
 (Air: 20%)
Area of Effect: 2 Blocks

Uppercut will light mobs on fire, dealing damage every 0.6 seconds.

Total Damage: 50% (of your DPS)
 (Damage: 35%)
 (Fire: 15%)
Duration: 3s

War Scream will deal more damage.

Total Damage: +60% (of your DPS)
 (Damage: +30%)
 (Air: +30%)
After casting 3 different spells in a row, your next spell will cost 1 Mana.

War Scream will fire a projectile that can go through walls and deal damage up to 3 times.

Total Damage: 75%
 (Damage: 55%)
 (Air: 20%)
Area of Effect: 2 Blocks (Circle-Shaped)
Range: 32 Blocks
When casting War Scream, create a holy shield around you that reduces all incoming damage by -70% for 3 hits. </br> </br>Cooldown: 20s

Casting War Scream will make you Corrupted. (Shift + War Scream to cancel) </br> While Corrupted, you lose the ability  to heal, and every 1% health you lose will grant you +1% Corrupted. </br> Gain +4 Raw Damage per 2% Corrupted. (Max +120) </br> </br>Cooldown: 10s
Improve your Main Attack's damage and range when using a spear. </br> Main Attack Damage: +5% </br>Range: +1 Block
Reduce the Mana cost of Uppercut. </br> Mana Cost: -5
During Charge, you can steer and change direction.

You take 25% reduced damage and attack back when hit by an enemy attack.

Total Damage: 100% (of your DPS)
 (Damage: 60%)
 (Thunder: 20%)
 (Air: 20%)
Cooldown: 2s
If you receive a hit that's less than 5% of your max health, gain 10 Mana. </br> </br>Cooldown: 1s

If you do not have enough mana to cast a spell, spend health instead. (0.35% health per mana) </br> A spell cast using health instead of mana will deal +15% to +25% bonus damage, depending on how much of its cost is paid in blood.

Hitting mobs with Charge will halt your momentum and knock them away.

Total Damage: 400% (of your DPS)
 (Damage: 275%)
 (Air: 75%)
 (Water: 50%)
Area of Effect: 4 Blocks
Reduce the Mana cost of Bash. </br> Mana Cost: -5

Gain the ability to unleash a Sacred Surge. Whenever any of your spells or abilities are triggered, increase your Holy Power by 1.
Uppercut will spend 25 Holy Power to smite hit enemies with holy energy, dealing extra damage.

Total Damage: 375% (of your DPS)
 (Damage: 285%)
 (Water: 50%)
 (Air: 40%)
War Scream bolsters courage, granting players a damage bonus and additional resistance. </br> </br>Effect: +8% Damage Bonus to Players </br>Effect: +5% Resistance Bonus to Allies
Gain +1.5% damage per 1% Corrupted. (Max +65%)

Deals damage to all nearby enemies every time you heal 5% of your max health. (Max 5 activations at once)

Total Damage: 60% (of your DPS)
 (Damage: 40%)
 (Water: 10%)
 (Fire: 10%)
Area of Effect: 6 Blocks (Circle-Shaped)

Increase the damage reduction of Counter by +10%
Increase the damage of Counter and reduce its cooldown by -0.5s.

Total Damage: +150% (of your DPS)
 (Damage: +90%)
 (Thunder: +30%)
 (Air: +30%)
After leaving Corrupted, restore 30% of your Corrupted bar as max health.
Reduce the Mana cost of War Scream by 5.
Charge will cleanse you of all negative effects and fire, as well as any allies you pass through. </br> </br>Area of Effect: 3 Blocks </br>Cooldown: 3s

Increase the damage of Bash.

Total Damage: +30% (of your DPS, per Bash)
 (Damage: +30%)

Bash will leave a puddle of boiling blood after its first explosion, slowing down and damaging enemies in it every 0.4 seconds.

Total Damage: 30% (of your DPS)
 (Damage: 25%)
 (Fire: 5%)
Effect: 20% Slowness to Enemies
Duration: 3s
Cooldown: 3s
After leaving Corrupted, gain 2.5% of missing health back for each hit dealt and enemy killed while Corrupted. </br> </br>Cooldown: 0.45s (for hits)

After being hit by Fireworks, enemies will crash unto the ground and receive more damage.

Total Damage: +100% (of your DPS)
 (Damage: +80%)
 (Earth: +20%)

Enemies thrown into walls from Flying Kick will explode and receive additional damage.

Total Damage: 200% (of your DPS)
 (Damage: 150%)
 (Fire: 50%)
Area of Effect: 4 Blocks
For any damage you take, regenerate 30% of the damage over the next 15s.
Reduces the cooldown of Bak'al's Grasp by -5s, and increases the raw damage gained for every 2% of health lost by +1.
For every 4% Reflection you have from items, gain +1/5s Mana Regen (Max 10/5s)

Uppercut will create a strong gust of air, launching you upward with enemies. (Hold shift to stay grounded)

Total Damage: +50% (of your DPS)
 (Damage: +10%)
 (Air: +40%)
Area of Effect: Circle-Shaped
Gain +5% Base Resistance and become immune to knockback.
Gaining 40% Corrupted will make your next Uppercut give you a damage boost. </br> </br>Effect: +30% Damage Bonus to Self </br>Duration: 8s </br>Cooldown: 16s

You gain a broken mantle whenever Mantle of the Bovemists loses a charge.
Hitting an enemy with Bash sends all broken mantles at them, dealing damage to nearby enemies.

Total Damage: 250% (of your DPS, per broken mantle)
 (Damage: 200%)
 (Fire: 50%)
Area of Effect: 7 Blocks (Circle-Shaped)
Duration: 20s
While you have 10 Holy Power, your Main Attacks are empowered, and grant you 5 Holy Power. </br> Main Attack Damage Bonus: +40% </br>Main Attack Range: +25% </br>Cooldown: 2s (for Holy Power)
Flaming Uppercut will do more damage, and grant 1 Holy Power</br>whenever it deals damage.</br>(+15% to neutral, +15% to fire)
Increase Bash's area of effect radius by +1 per 3% Corrupted. (Max +10)

War Scream will ripple the ground and deal damage to enemies 3 times over a large area every 0.6s.

Total Damage: 50% (of your DPS, per ripple)
 (Damage: 30%)
 (Earth: 10%)
 (Air: 10%)
Area of Effect: 12 Blocks (Circle-Shaped)
Reduce the Mana cost of Charge and increase your Walk Speed by +20%. </br> Mana Cost: -5
Enemies damaged by War Scream will become Provoked, targeting only you for at least 8s. </br> Reduce the Mana cost of War Scream. </br> Mana Cost: -5 </br>Cooldown: 15s
While Corrupted, hitting an enemy with your Main Attack will add +1.5% Corruption, per second. (Powder Specials always add +3%)

Increases the damage and mana cost of Uppercut.
Mana Cost: +5
Total Damage: +100% (of your DPS)
 (Damage: +100%)

Bash will buff positive IDs of yourself and allies. (XP Bonus, Loot Bonus, Loot Quality, Gather XP Bonus, and Gather Speed Bonus are excluded) </br> </br>Effect: +20% ID Effectiveness to Allies </br>Duration: 8s </br>Cooldown: 15s
Add +2 additional charges to Mantle of the Bovemists.
Reduce the Mana cost of War Scream. </br> Mana Cost: -5
Increases the cap of Enraged Blow by +50%.

Damaging enemies will inflict them with +2 Discombobulated. (Max 150) </br> You will deal +1 neutral and elemental damage to enemies for every Discombobulated they have. -4 of the bonus decays every second.

Bash will cast at the player's position at double the speed and with an increased area of effect.

Total Damage: +120% (of your DPS, per bash)
 (Damage: +60%)
 (Thunder: +60%)
Area of Effect: +3 Blocks (Circle-Shaped)
With Quadruple Bash, gain less damage.

Total Damage: +30% (of your DPS, per bash)
 (Thunder: +30%)

After casting War Scream, envelop yourself with a vortex that damages nearby enemies every 0.35s.

Total Damage: 70% (of your DPS)
 (Damage: 40%)
 (Air: 20%)
 (Fire: 10%)
Duration: 20s
Area of Effect: 6 Blocks (Circle-Shaped)

Increases the damage of Sacred Surge.

Total Damage: +250% (of your DPS)
 (Damage: +200%)
 (Water: +25%)
 (Air: +25%)

Casting War Scream while holding shift with at least 25 Holy Power will spend all of it to sound off a protective trumpet. </br> All nearby allies are granted +1% Overhealth for each point of Holy Power consumed. Overhealth decays over 20s. </br> </br>Range: 16 Blocks (Circle-Shaped) </br>Cooldown: 20s
You gain a +40% Resistance buff if your health is at 25% or less.

After leaving Corrupted, annihilate all enemies around you. For every 1% Corrupted you had, damage increases by 5%.

Total Damage: 400% (of your DPS)
 (Damage: 300%)
 (Fire: 100%)
Area of Effect: 12 Blocks (Circle-Shaped)
Reduce the Mana cost of Uppercut by 5.

Keeps you alive with 30% of your health remaining and makes all nearby allies invincible after receiving a fatal blow. </br> </br>Effect: Invincibility to Allies </br>Duration: 3s </br>Area of Effect: 12 Blocks (Circle-Shaped) </br>Cooldown: 10m
Reduce Blood Pact's health cost. (0.235% health per mana)
You fall more slowly during Charge. </br> </br>Duration: 2s
Massacre adds twice as much Corruption. </br> While Corrupted, your Main Attack and Powder Specials now cost 0.5% health to use, activating Blood Pact.

When Generalist acts on a spell, it is enhanced.
Bash gains 4x as many hits and is 0.2s faster.
Uppercut deals additional damage.
Total Damage: +395% (of your DPS)
 (Damage: +170%)
 (Rainbow Damage: +45%)
War Scream grants a damage boost, but effect duration is reduced.
Effect: +10% Damage Bonus to Players
Duration: 12s

Air Shout can hit +2 times, and deals more damage.

Total Damage: 40% (of your DPS)
 (Damage: 20%)
 (Thunder: 10%)
 (Air: 10%)
